content: --अभावः mutual non-existence or negation; one of the two main kinds of अभाव; it is reciprocal negation of identity, essence, or respective peculiarity, and is equivalent to difference (भेद); तादात्म्यसंबंधावच्छिन्नप्रतियोगिकोऽ न्योन्याभावः, as घटः पटो न भवति; it exists between two notions which have no property in common.
